nodes.text: Shadow Number One was the designation of a hole made in the solar wind of the Rapacc system by one of its two gas giant planets. When Senior Captain Mitth'raw'nuruodo of the Chiss Ascendancy undertook a mission to the system while investigating a derelict Paccosh refugee starship, he planned for his cruiser Springhawk and Admiral Ar'alani's Vigilant to enter through Shadow Number One, with the Vigilant subsequently exiting through Shadow Number Two.
